Name: Manhattan (Sweet)
Ingredients: 15 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof /50% alc./vol.)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist and Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
EXPRESS orange zest twist over cocktail and discard.
Review: I prefer my Manhattans served "Sweet", or " Perfect " at a push. The Manhattan is complex, challenging and moreish. Best of all, it's available in a style to suit every palate . For me, it's this recipe or the brilliantly simple High Ryeser Manhattan .
Nutrition: One serving of Manhattan (Sweet) contains 191 calories
